attributes.action: Ban the 'book' dog trip advisor advert on TV & remove from TV immediately.
attributes.additional_details: When surveyed, me and 100% of my associates aged 25-32 all agreed the advert was very annoying & the product was not effectively communicated through the advert.
attributes.background:
The noise the dog makes is about x5 decibels louder than the rest of the advert, it makes people jump, it's irritating & doesn't even promote the product effectively.

I'm calling for 1000+ signatures to support me in my endeavour to remove yet another abomination on our televisions.

rejection.details:
The UK Government and Parliament don't directly control which specific adverts are shown on TV. 

The Advertising Standards Authority looks at complaints about advertisements. You can find out more about making a complaint to the ASA here:

https://www.asa.org.uk/
